Document:
# Salads
- [color=#fcdf03]All salads need a[/color] [color=#a4885c]large bowl[/color] [color=#fcdf03]along with everything else![/color]
[color=#a4885c]Herb Salad[/color]
- Bowl - 3x Ambrosia Vulgaris - Apple
[color=#a4885c]Valid Salad[/color]
- Bowl - 3x Ambrosia Vulgaris
- Potato - Meatball
[color=#a4885c]Coleslaw[/color]
- 5u vinaigrette - Bowl
- Red onion - Cabbage
[color=#a4885c]Caesar Salad[/color]
- 5u olive oil - Bowl - Slice of red onion
- Slice of bread - Mozzarella cheese - Cabbage
[color=#a4885c]Kimchi Salad[/color]
- 5u vinegar - Bowl
- Carrot - Cabbage - Garlic
[color=#a4885c]Mothic Salad[/color]
- Cabage - Red Onion Slice - Tomato
[color=#a4885c]Caprese Salad[/color]
- 5u vinaigrette - Tomato
- Mozzarella cheese - Ambrosia Vulgaris
[color=#a4885c]Fleet Salad[/color]
- 5u vinaigrette - Mothic Salad - Carrot
- Slice of bread - Cheese wedge
[color=#a4885c]Cotton Salad[/color]
- 5u vinaigrette - Mothic Salad
- Carrot - Cotton
[color=#a4885c]Kachumbari Salad[/color]
- 5u lime juice - Mothic Salad - Chili pepper
- Red onion - Ambrosia Vulgaris
